summary: This is a mod wich overhauls how fire work with the enviroment.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CHOsDsN.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/tISTctz.jpg[/img][center]- Fire can now interact with the enviroment.
Example: you drow a firebold at the wooden floor in whiterun dragonreach, the fire will get's biger and burn almost the whole building.

- Dynamic Combat with Flames
You can use the new power of the dynamic flames to fight your enemies.
Example: go to a bandit camp and just burn everything you see, the flames will do the rest !


[img]https://i.imgur.com/RIbyj5Z.jpg[/img]

﻿The mod should be compatible with almost every other mod but it's not like i tested it


[img]https://i.imgur.com/1E28Ccb.jpg[/img][b]
- DO NOT USE THIS MOD IN A VALUEABLE SAVE GAME -[/b]

There is a problem with CTD when the flames go big enough i'am not totaly sure if it's only on me because of my lack of ram at the moment or in generall.
If you expirience any sort of bugs report them in the bug tab.

How do i test if this mod is the cause of the bug ?

1. You deactivate every other mod in your mod list
2. you go into the game and wait until the bug get's triggered
3. report


[img]https://i.imgur.com/UeDxlPW.jpg[/img]
03.06.2018 - Mod added to the Nexus






[img]https://i.imgur.com/1PUJ2HP.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]
author: BakaEntertainmentProjectsofDoom
